com.iver.cit.gvsig.cad
Class SmoothGeometry

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.andami.plugins.Extension
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.cad.SimplifyGeometry
          com.iver.cit.gvsig.cad.SmoothGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.andami.plugins.IExtension
public class SmoothGeometry
extends SimplifyGeometry

Smooths selected geometries (with dimension 1 or 2) applying the specified curve. Supported curves are:

  1. BEZIER
  2. B_SPLINE
  3. CARDINAL SPLINE
  4. CATMULLROM SPLINE
  5. CUBIC B_SPLINE
  6. LAGRANGE
  7. NATURAL CUBIC SPLINE
  8. NURBS

    9. Author:
    Alvaro Zabala
